value.title: Imagination and Andes jointly validate GPU with RISC-V CPU IP
value.excerpt: Imagination Technologies and Andes Technology announces the successful testing and validation of the IMG B-Series Graphics Processing Units (GPU) with the RISC-V compliant Andes AX45, a 64-bit high performance-efficient and configurable superscalar Central Processing Unit (CPU).

value.title: Can’t buy a new GPU? Here’s how to make your graphics card faster

value.title: Samsung announces Exynos 2200 chipset with AMD RDNA 2-based Xclipse GPU
value.excerpt: Samsung has announced its latest flagship smartphone processor — Exynos 2200, which will be powering the company’s upcoming premium smartphones later this year. This is the same chipset that the company was set to unveil on 11th January but got delayed.

value.title: Samsung Introduces Game Changing Exynos 2200 Processor with Xclipse GPU Powered by AMD RDNA 2 Architecture
value.excerpt: Samsung Electronics Co., Ltd., a world leader in advanced semiconductor technology, today announced its new premium mobile processor, the Exynos 2200. The Exynos 2200 is a freshly designed mobile processor with a powerful AMD RDNA 2 architecture based Samsung Xclipse graphics processing unit (GPU).

value.title: Seeing Machines launches partnership with AI firm Ambrella
